author: sebor
msg: (PunctData): New base class of the Punct<charT> template to reduce
and user-defined InputIterator type in addition to character pointer.
(do_test): New helper to dispatch to the appropriate specialization of
(test_errno, test_bool, test_shrt, ...): Removed the charT template
(run_tests): New dispatch function on iterator type.

author: ekoneil
msg: Fixup the DivPanelCRI to implement both the RequestInterceptor and Command APIs.  Once we've decided if trunk/ is a 1.x release or a 1.0.x release, we can remove the RequestInterceptor part of the implementation.
Need to switch the webapp configurations from using global interceptors to commands next.

author: aheritier
